General.Name: Guangdong Taiantang Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Taiantang Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of Chinese patent medicines in China. It offers medicines in the forms of creams, ointments, tablets, capsules, pills, and solutions for the areas, including reproductive health, skin health, cardiovascular, cerebrovascular, dermatology, anti-inflammatory, and other areas. The company also engages in the processing and trade of Chinese medicinal materials; and pharmaceutical e-commerce business. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Shantou, China.
General.Address: Kirin Park, Jinyuan Industrial Zone, Shantou, China, 515021

3.Name: Mr. Xiao Wei  Chen
